ing: 2 fluid ounces sweet and sour mix
des: "It's a Hawaiian vacation in a glass. You can't help but feel on vacation as you sip this tropical rum-based concoction. Be careful-this drink has a kick! You can substitute Triple Sec for the orange Curacao if you must."
ins:
Fill a large glass with ice; use a stir stick to mix in the light rum, amber rum, orange Curacao, pineapple juice, and sweet and sour mix.
Slowly and gently drizzle the dark rum on top of the cocktail so it floats on top of the drink.
